translation.en: Sharkboy was not always half-shark, half-boy.
translation.fr:
Sharkboy n'a pas toujours été
mi-requin, mi-garçon.

translation.en: He was a marine biologist, or at least in training.
translation.fr:
Il était océanographe,
ou du moins, en formation.

translation.en: His father studied great white sharks...
translation.fr:
Son père étudiait
les grands requins blancs.

translation.en: ...and called his son "Sharkboy"...
...because of how much he loved to care for sharks.
translation.fr:
tant il aimait
prendre soin des requins.

translation.en: He made them sushi and had given them all names.
translation.fr:
Il leur préparait des sushis
et leur avait donné des noms.

translation.en: Good Milk, Piggy, Egg Battle and Kraken.
But one day, an incredible, mysterious storm appeared.
translation.fr:
Mais un jour, une incroyable
et mystérieuse tempête éclata.

translation.en: It swept away the entire laboratory.
-Sharkboy! -Thanks to the life rafts...
-...Sharkboy and his father survived. -Sharkboy!
But they survived on different sides of the wreckage...
translation.fr:
Mais ils durent leur salut
à des débris dérivant

translation.en: ...each floating off in a different direction.
Sharkboy was completely alone.
Almost completely.
But one of the sharks recognized him.
Hey. It's Sharkboy.
Don't take a bite out of him, boys. He's a friend.
translation.fr:
Ne le croquez pas, les mecs.
C'est un ami.

translation.en: They took Sharkboy to their cave home, where he'd be safe and dry.
translation.fr:
Ils l'emmenèrent dans leur repaire,
à l'abri et au sec.

translation.en: His new family were sharks.
translation.fr: Il fut adopté par les requins.

translation.en: Hundreds of sharks.
The sharks raised him as one of their own...
translation.fr:
Ils l'élevèrent
comme l'un des leurs,

translation.en: ...training him in the ways of the shark.
translation.fr:
lui apprenant à vivre
comme un requin.

translation.en: You must keep moving to survive.
translation.fr:
Tu dois rester en mouvement
pour survivre.

translation.en: Always go forward, never back.
To live by instinct, and instinct alone.
translation.fr:
Suivre son instinct
et uniquement son instinct.

translation.en: Eventually, he grew gills and sharp talons for claws.
translation.fr:
Il finit par lui pousser
des branchies et des griffes acérées.

translation.en: His teeth sharpened themselves to a point.
He grew fins. All sorts of fins.
translation.fr:
Il lui poussa des nageoires,
toutes sortes de nageoires.

translation.en: But that was years ago.
I first met Sharkboy while fishing on a dock this summer.
translation.fr:
J'ai rencontré Sharkboy
alors que je pêchais, cet été.

translation.en: He seemed lost.
-You have to get a real job. -No, I have a job.
translation.fr:
- Trouve un vrai travail !
- J'ai un travail !

translation.en: So I snuck him home...
-I can't stand the writing process. -Maybe you should leave.
translation.fr:
- J'en ai marre de l'écriture !
- Tu n'as qu'à partir.

translation.en: ...when my parents were too busy to notice.
translation.fr:
Mes parents étaient trop pris
pour remarquer.

translation.en: I kept him fed and in water.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai nourri
et je l'ai mis dans l'eau.

translation.en: He had been traveling the universe in search of his father.
translation.fr:
II avait parcouru l'univers
à la recherche de son père.

translation.en: He told me of his latest adventures on a planet so cool...
translation.fr:
Il me raconta ses aventures,
sur une planète

translation.en: ...it makes you drool.
He said I, too, could go to Planet Drool someday.
translation.fr:
Il m'a dit que je pourrais aller
sur la planète Roucool.

translation.en: Then one night, I was visited by a glowing light.
translation.fr:
Une nuit, apparut
une lumière éblouissante.

translation.en: An amazing girl with purple flames for hair...
translation.fr:
Une fille incroyable
aux cheveux de feu fuchsia

translation.en: ...and skin of molten lava rock appeared.
translation.fr:
et à la peau
de lave en fusion apparut.

translation.en: I called her Lavagirl.
She smiled at me, for that seemed to be her name.
translation.fr:
Elle me sourit,
ce devait donc être son nom.

translation.en: She told me she needed Sharkboy to return to Planet Drool with her...
translation.fr:
Elle voulait que Sharkboy
retourne sur Roucool avec elle,

translation.en: ...for a great crisis was developing.
She asked if I could go with them.
translation.fr:
Elle me demanda
de les accompagner.

translation.en: I told her, "I have school tomorrow."
She gave me a sad look and flamed away...
translation.fr:
Elle eut un regard triste
et fondit sur l'horizon...

translation.en: ...taking Sharkboy with her.
I haven't seen Sharkboy or Lavagirl since then.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai plus revu Sharkboy
et Lavagirl, depuis.

translation.en: And that's what I did this summer.
translation.fr: Voilà ce que j'ai fait cet été.

translation.en: Enough.
Someone is picking that up. And it's not gonna be me.
translation.fr:
Quelqu'un va ramasser.
Et ça ne sera pas moi !

translation.en: We were supposed to tell true stories.
translation.fr:
On devait raconter
des histoires vraies.

translation.en: That is a true story.
-Does Lavagirl have special powers? -There's no such thing as Lavagirl.
translation.fr:
- Lavagirl a des super-pouvoirs ?
- Lavagirl n'existe pas.

translation.en: She can--
-She can shoot lava out of her hands. -Cool.
translation.fr: faire jaillir de la lave de ses mains. Cool !

translation.en: How many people think Max's story is true?
translation.fr:
Qui pense que
cette histoire est vraie ?

translation.en: -Not true. -Made-up.
-Not true. -It's just a made-up story.
If it's true, why don't you bring Sharkboy...
-...and Lavagirl to class tomorrow? -They went away.
translation.fr:
- et Lavagirl demain.
- Ils sont partis.

translation.en: -I don't know where they went. -Have a seat, Max.
translation.fr:
- Je ne sais pas où.
- Va t'asseoir.

translation.en: Linus, you're next.
This summer, I met a new friend...
translation.fr: Cet été, je me suis fait un copain

translation.en: ...who was half-dork, half-boy.
translation.fr: qui était moitié débile, moitié garçon.

translation.en: I called him Dorkboy.
His real name was Max.
We had him for dinner, but he stunk so bad that we all blew chunks.
translation.fr:
Il a dîné chez nous. Mais il sentait
si mauvais qu'on a tous dé-go-bi-llé.

translation.en: That's enough, Linus.
Linus, Max, stay.
-Come on, Mr. E. -Class, what's my name?
translation.fr:
- Allez, Monsieur E !
- Comment je m'appelle ?

translation.en: Mr. Electricidad.
Mr. Electricidad, exactly.
Not "Mr. Electric." Not "Mr. Electrici...."
translation.fr:
Pas M. Electric,
ni M. Electrici-da-da-da-da.

translation.en: Linus, you just earned a minus for your behavior today.
translation.fr:
Tu as décroché un malus
pour ton attitude.

translation.en: This is a new year. Do you think you can be friends?
translation.fr:
C'est une nouvelle année.
Vous pourriez être amis ?

translation.en: -No. -No.
Then it's decided, you'll be the best of friends.
translation.fr:
C'est décidé,
vous serez de super-copains.

translation.en: Which means no more picking on Max, Linus.
translation.fr:
En clair, Linus,
tu n'embêtes plus Max.

translation.en: Max, you're in the fourth grade.
There are good kids in this class.
translation.fr:
Il y a des enfants bien,
dans cette classe.

translation.en: Find them, make friends with them.
translation.fr:
Il y a des enfants bien,
dans cette classe. Fais-t'en des amis.

translation.en: Dreaming keeps you from seeing what's right here in front of you.
translation.fr:
Rêver t'empêche de voir
ce qui est devant toi.

translation.en: This isn't a dream. This is the real world.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas un rêve.
C'est le monde réel.

translation.en: -I lost my train of thought. -No dreaming. Got it.
translation.fr:
- Ma ligne de pensée a déraillé.
- Plus de rêve. Compris.

translation.en: -I'll try harder. -What do you have there?
translation.fr:
- Je vais encore essayer.
- Qu'est-ce que c'est ?

translation.en: It's my dream journal.
It has all of my most precious dreams in it.
translation.fr:
Il contient mes rêves
les plus précieux.

translation.en: And I'll never part with it for as long as I live.
translation.fr:
Il ne me quittera pas
tant que je vivrai.

translation.en: You're a good kid, Max.
Let's be imaginary friends.
You can try and hang with us, and we'll pretend you don't exist.
translation.fr:
Tu peux traîner avec nous,
on fera comme si t'existais pas.

translation.en: Check it out. Sharkboy gets shocked by electric eels...
translation.fr:
Regarde ça. Sharkboy électrocuté
par des anguilles électriques.

translation.en: ...and then they feed on his cooked flesh.
Wow, Linus.
Your skills are weak.
translation.fr: Tu as un talent... de chiotte !

translation.en: I'm gonna burst your bubble, dream boy.
translation.fr:
Je vais exploser ton nuage,
Rêve-boy.

translation.en: You're dead.
Get the book!
Give me the book.
Hand over the book, or you'll visit the dream world.
translation.fr:
File ça ou je t'envoie
au Pays des Rêves.

translation.en: I'll bring you a revised edition tomorrow.
translation.fr:
Je t'apporte
une version corrigée demain.

translation.en: -Max, wake up. -Dream, Max.
-Open your eyes, Max. -Eyes open and dream.
translation.fr:
- Ouvre les yeux.
- Ouvre-les et rêve.

translation.en: -Stay dreaming. -Wake up!
Sharkboy...
...and Lavagirl.
My cookies. My giant cookies.
What are you doing baking sweets?
You know what happens when he eats sugar.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que ça lui fait.

translation.en: I baked them for his class.
So you could make friends at school, and now you've eaten them.
translation.fr:
Pour te faire des amis à l'école.
Tu as tout mangé !

translation.en: No. It was Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
Look. This one has shark bites, and this one is singed.
translation.fr:
Celui-ci a des morsures de requin.
Celui-là est grillé.

translation.en: There's no such thing as Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
Well, I believe him.
Your mother's right.
When you go to sleep and close your eyes, they may come back.
translation.fr:
Quand tu t'endors,
ils peuvent revenir.

translation.en: When you open them again, Sharkgirl and Lavaboy will be:
translation.fr:
Quand tu rouvriras les yeux,
Sharkgirl et Lavaboy auront...

translation.en: -Out of here. -But--
Mouth closed. Eyes closed.
-Now? -Yes, now.
You can wait till you're in bed to close your eyes.
translation.fr:
Attends d'être au lit
pour fermer les yeux.

translation.en: Kids need their dreams.
translation.fr: Les gosses ont besoin de rêver.

translation.en: Kids need to grow up.
translation.fr:
Les gosses... ont besoin
de grandir.

translation.en: He's not making any friends with these cookies.
translation.fr:
Il ne se fera aucun ami
avec ces cookies.

translation.en: There's no such thing as Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
There's no such thing as Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
Yes, there is.
Stupid plugs.
Please don't let me have to go to school.
translation.fr:
Pitié, ne me forcez pas
à aller à l'école.

translation.en: They'll make fun of me. I know it.
translation.fr: Ils vont se moquer de moi, je le sais.

translation.en: I wish I could just escape this loser world and go to Planet Drool.
translation.fr:
Si je pouvais fuir ce monde trop nul
pour la planète Roucool.

translation.en: Games and toys and laughs and fun.
translation.fr:
Des jeux, des jouets,
des rires, la fête.

translation.en: May there be terrible storms...
translation.fr:
Pourvu qu'il y ait
de terribles tempêtes,

translation.en: ...rain, sleet, snow, tornados...
translation.fr:
de la pluie, du grésil,
de la neige, des tornades...

translation.en: ...so I can lay here all day tomorrow...
translation.fr:
pour que je ne bouge pas
d'ici demain...

translation.en: ...and dream of Drool.
translation.fr: et que je rêve de Roucool.

translation.en: Guess I didn't dream hard enough.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas dû rêver assez fort.

translation.en: There are good opportunities out there. You just need to look.
translation.fr:
Il y a plein
de bonnes annonces, regarde.

translation.en: Traffic engineer.
I was cleaning out my closet, look what I found.
translation.fr:
En rangeant mon bureau,
j'ai trouvé ça.

translation.en: Remember Tobor, the robot you tried to build?
translation.fr:
Tu te souviens de Tobor,
le robot que tu fabriquais ?

translation.en: Why were you cleaning out your closet?
I had to find one of these.
-Is Mom making you get a real job? -Writing is a real job.
translation.fr:
Maman veut
que t'aies un vrai travail ? Ecrire en est un.

translation.en: -When it pays. -I'm walking you to school today.
translation.fr:
- Quand ça paie.
- Je t'accompagne à l'école.

translation.en: So, what do you say? Wanna finish making Tobor?
translation.fr: Ça te dit qu'on termine Tobor ?

translation.en: -It won't work. -Well, how do you know?
translation.fr:
- Il ne fonctionnera jamais.
- Comment tu le sais ?

translation.en: Because you told me it wouldn't.
I did?
I'm sorry.
-I should've never said that. -It's okay. You were right.
translation.fr:
- Je n'aurais pas dû dire ça.
- C'est rien, tu avais raison.

translation.en: Dumb idea.
How did this happen?
The grass was dead anyway.
translation.fr: Le gazon était foutu, de toute façon.

translation.en: Why are you so morbid?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu vois tout en noir ?

translation.en: I just wish anything could happen so I wouldn't have to go to school today.
translation.fr:
Pourvu qu'un truc
m'empêche d'aller à l'école.

translation.en: That's not realistic, Max.
It's bad enough your father's head is in the clouds, but not you too. Okay?
translation.fr:
C'est assez dur que ton père
soit un rêveur, ne t'y mets pas.

translation.en: Just push that dream aside and move on.
translation.fr: Mets ce rêve au placard et avance.

translation.en: Like with your dream?
The one about you and Dad and me?
translation.fr: Celui avec toi, papa et moi.

translation.en: Well, I do have a dream about us...
...but as I'm sure you've been noticing lately, your father and I are just....
translation.fr:
Mais ces temps-ci,
ton père et moi...

translation.en: Well, we're...
...not compatible.
Sorry, I don't mean to dump this on you right before you go to school, but--
translation.fr:
Pardon, je ne veux pas
te communiquer mon stress avant l'école, mais...

translation.en: School's waiting.
Did we have to move so close to school?
translation.fr:
Il fallait emménager
à côté de l'école ?

translation.en: Your father thought we'd save money on gas.
translation.fr:
Ton père pensait
faire des économies d'essence.

translation.en: Come right home after school today...
...because there's some things we need to talk about.
I love you.
I wish anything could happen so I wouldn't have to come home today.
translation.fr:
Pourvu qu'un truc
m'empêche de rentrer chez moi.

translation.en: Hey, look. It's dream boy.
Who knows where tornados come from?
translation.fr:
Qui sait comment se forme
une tornade ?

translation.en: Well, when cold air mixes with hot air, it can form a tornado.
translation.fr:
Air froid + air chaud
= risque de tornade.

translation.en: As the hot and cold chase each other around and around and around.
translation.fr:
Le chaud et le froid
se repoussent et tourbillonnent.

translation.en: I dreamt of a story kind of like Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
translation.fr:
J'ai rêvé d'une histoire
comme celle de Sharkboy et Lavagirl.

translation.en: Ice Girl and Dream Boy.
Her powers come from her Crystal Heart.
translation.fr: Ses pouvoirs viennent de son cristal.

translation.en: -No more fairy tales. -Piranha Girl and Beluga Boy.
translation.fr:
- Assez de contes de fées !
- Piranha-girl et Beluga-boy.

translation.en: Plastic Boy and Metal Girl.
Barf Boy and Vomit Girl.
Does everyone hear me? I'm a teacher, right?
Wrong. I'm an awakener.
Only I'm finding it more and more difficult to keep my class awake.
translation.fr:
C'est de plus en plus dur
de garder ma classe éveillée.

translation.en: No recess again for you, Marissa. Too many allergies.
translation.fr:
Pas de récré, Marissa,
tu fais trop d'allergies.

translation.en: Got more boogers on your homework than there is homework.
translation.fr: Ton devoir est bourré de postillons.

translation.en: I'm just cold.
I'll be happy to change places with you.
-It's a lot warmer back in my spot. -But I have to sit up front.
translation.fr:
- Il fait plus chaud, dans mon coin.
- Je dois être au premier rang.

translation.en: It's just that you're sitting right under the vent.
-And it's August and you're sneezing. -You're gonna get me in trouble.
translation.fr:
- C'est l'été et tu éternues.
- Tu vas m'attirer des ennuis.

translation.en: Max.
Are you trying to make real friends?
translation.fr:
Tu essaies
de te faire de vrais amis ?

translation.en: Yeah. Trying like you told me to.
That's good.
Just not with my daughter, okay?
translation.fr: Mais pas avec ma fille, OK ?

translation.en: -No. It wasn't like that. It's just-- -Sit down, Max.
translation.fr:
- C'était pas pour ça...
- Va t'asseoir.

translation.en: -Give me back my journal. -Class has begun. Everyone, sit.
translation.fr:
- Rends-moi mon journal !
- A vos places !

translation.en: -Linus took my journal. -I did not.
translation.fr:
- Linus a pris mon journal.
- C'est pas vrai !

translation.en: Minus. I mean Linus.
You get a minus for misconduct. Give Max back his journal.
translation.fr:
Tu écopes d'un malus.
Rends-lui son journal.

translation.en: One more time, Linus, and we'll have to change your name to "Minus."
translation.fr:
Continue et on devra
te rebaptiser "Malus".

translation.en: -He ruined my dream journal! -I did not.
translation.fr:
- Il a bousillé mon journal !
- C'est pas vrai !

translation.en: Mr. Electric, send him to the principal's office...
...and have him expelled!
You're in my class, not the other way around.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes dans ma classe,
pas le contraire !

translation.en: I know everything, and you know nothing.
translation.fr: Je sais tout et vous ne savez rien !

translation.en: At the end of class, both of you will report to the principal's office...
translation.fr:
La classe finie, vous irez
tous les deux chez le directeur...

translation.en: ...with your parents.
Everybody down!
It's them.
I'm looking for Max.
She's hot.
We need your help, Max. Come with us.
translation.fr:
On a besoin de toi.
Viens avec nous.

translation.en: What do I have to do?
Go with us to Planet Drool. We'll explain on the way.
translation.fr:
Aller sur la planète Roucool.
On t'expliquera.

translation.en: We're going to Planet Drool?
translation.fr: On va sur la planète Roucool ?

translation.en: It's my home planet, just outside our solar system.
translation.fr:
C'est ma planète,
à la limite du système solaire.

translation.en: You should know, Max. You made it up.
translation.fr:
Tu devrais le savoir.
Tu l'as imaginée.

translation.en: -I can't go with you. -Why not?
translation.fr:
- Je ne peux pas venir.
- Pourquoi ?

translation.en: Because you're not real. Both of you are just a dream.
translation.fr:
Parce que vous n'existez pas.
Vous n'êtes qu'un rêve.

translation.en: And when I open my eyes...
...you'll be gone.
We're still here, Max.
If you wanna stop the Darkness from destroying our worlds...
translation.fr:
Si tu veux empêcher les Ténèbres
de détruire nos mondes,

translation.en: ...come with us.
You better go with them.
Okay.
I'll go.
Everyone follow me. We're gonna go find shelter.
translation.fr:
Venez !
On va se mettre à l'abri.

translation.en: I can't believe I'm finally getting to ditch this place...
translation.fr: Je me tire enfin de ce coin.

translation.en: ...and go to Planet Drool.
translation.fr: Je vais sur la planète Roucool.

translation.en: How are we getting there?
Put these on, everybody.
Blue goggles for the boys, pink for the girls.
translation.fr:
Bleues pour les garçons,
roses pour les filles.

translation.en: Do you have another pair of boy goggles?
So how do you fly it?
You don't know?
That's sort of been the whole problem.
You press "Go."
-Now how do you fly it? -It's got an autopilot.
translation.fr:
- Comment ça se pilote ?
- Y a le pilotage automatique !

translation.en: You thought of everything, didn't you, Max?
translation.fr: T'as bien pensé à tout, Max ?

translation.en: Not exactly.
-How do we land it? -That's the part I never thought of.
translation.fr:
- Comment on atterrit ?
- Ça, je n'y ai pas pensé !

translation.en: Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune.
You might wanna hold on to something.
-Recognize your dream world, Max? -Not really.
translation.fr:
- Tu reconnais le monde de tes rêves?
- Pas vraiment.

translation.en: I feel like I should, but I just don't.
translation.fr:
Ça me dit quelque chose,
mais pas plus.

translation.en: It's affecting him too.
I thought he would just remember.
-Remember what? -Your dreams. This planet?
translation.fr:
- Me souvenir de quoi ?
- De tes rêves. De cette planète.

translation.en: Us.
Your powers.
-I have powers? -More than any of us.
translation.fr:
- J'ai des pouvoirs ?
- Plus que nous tous.

translation.en: Don't you know that?
Everything that is or was began with a dream.
translation.fr:
Tout ce qui est ou était
a commencé par un rêve.

translation.en: And you dreamt us, Max.
-Us and this whole place. -I did?
translation.fr:
- Nous, et tout cet endroit.
- J'ai fait ça ?

translation.en: Every dream you ever had landed right here on Planet Drool.
translation.fr:
Tous tes rêves ont atterri
sur la planète Roucool.

translation.en: -Why is it so dark? -The planet is dying.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi cette obscurité ?
- La planète se meurt.

translation.en: It began yesterday.
What's the calculation, Sharkboy?
Forty-five minutes till the Darkness destroys Planet Drool.
translation.fr:
Dans 45 mn, les Ténèbres
détruiront Roucool.

translation.en: We didn't go to Earth to save you, Max.
translation.fr: On ne t'a pas ramené pour te sauver.

translation.en: We need you to save Planet Drool.
translation.fr: Mais pour que tu sauves Roucool.

translation.en: But how?
The Dream Lair is on the other side of the planet.
translation.fr:
Le Palais des Rêves
est de l'autre côté de la planète.

translation.en: That's where your dreams are going bad.
translation.fr:
C'est là
où tes rêves malades vont.

translation.en: We have to go there and reverse it.
We have to travel through the Passage of Time...
translation.fr:
Il faudra franchir
le Passage du Temps,

translation.en: ...catch the Train of Thought, swim down the Stream of Consciousness...
translation.fr:
prendre la Ligne de Pensée,
descendre le Flot de Conscience

translation.en: ...and skate across the Sea of Confusion, now covered in ice.
translation.fr:
et patiner sur la Mer de Confusion,
actuellement gelée.

translation.en: Why'd you do that, Max? Why'd you freeze the ocean?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tu as fait ça ?
Pourquoi tu as gelé l'Océan ?

translation.en: Max didn't mean to do it. Did you, Max? Max is a good boy.
translation.fr:
Max n'a pas fait exprès, pas vrai ?
C'est un garçon bien.

translation.en: Otherwise, you and I would be evil, and we're not evil.
translation.fr:
Sinon, on serait méchants,
et on l'est pas.

translation.en: I'm not evil, am I, Max?
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas méchante, hein ?

translation.en: I don't-- I don't think so.
That's why we brought you here. To put things back in order.
translation.fr:
On t'a amené ici
pour tout remettre en ordre.

translation.en: We just have to stay positive. It's not the end of the world.
translation.fr:
Restons positifs.
Ce n'est pas la fin du monde.

translation.en: Not yet, it's not.
The Darkness. Run!
This is like a bad dream.
Oh, yeah? Just wait till you meet Mr. Electric.
He's the worst bad dream yet.
Where is everyone?
-They're trapped on Mount Neverest. -By Mr. Electric.
translation.fr: Prisonniers, sur le Mont Sans-Repos. De M. Electric.

translation.en: But Planet Drool is a place for kids to dream and have endless fun.
translation.fr:
Sur Roucool, les enfants rêvent
et s'amusent sans fin.

translation.en: It's endless fun, all right.
Once you get on...
...you can't get off.
Kids aren't allowed to rest, because if they rest, they sleep.
translation.fr:
Interdiction de se reposer.
Sinon, ils s'endorment.

translation.en: And if they sleep, they dream, and if they dream--
translation.fr:
Et s'ils s'endorment, ils rêvent.
Et s'ils rêvent...

translation.en: It takes power away from Mr. Electric.
But we're gonna stop him with our secret weapon.
translation.fr:
Mais on l'aura,
avec notre arme secrète.

translation.en: Shouldn't we save those kids first?
translation.fr: On délivre pas ces enfants, avant ?

translation.en: Why can't I do that?
Lavagirl!
Who knows where Mr. Electric is hiding?
translation.fr: Qui sait où se cache M. Electric ?

translation.en: Everyone?
They're not raising their hands. You're all upside down.
translation.fr:
Ils ne lèvent pas la main.
Vous êtes à l'envers.

translation.en: Who is stopping my unstoppable coasters?
translation.fr:
Qui a arrêté
mon inarrêtable Grand Huit ?

translation.en: -Back in your seats. -Go. Run. Hide!
-Let's get out of here. -Everyone back in your seats.
Who's Mr. Electric?
He's supposed to provide light to the planet...
translation.fr: Il est censé nous fournir la lumière,

translation.en: ...but all he brings now is Darkness.
translation.fr: mais il n'apporte que les Ténèbres.

translation.en: The fun has begun.
He's taking us up.
My home. At half its normal power.
translation.fr:
Ma maison ! Elle a perdu
la moitié de sa puissance.

translation.en: He's taking us down.
Showtime.
Keep playing. Never stop.
Games and toys and laughs-- Hey. Hey.
translation.fr:
Des jeux, des jouets,
des rires...

translation.en: Hey. Hey. And fun.
Well, well, well. If it isn't Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
What are you doing halting my endless fun-coaster...
translation.fr:
Vous osez arrêter
mon Grand Huit sans fin

translation.en: ...and infiltrating my lair?
translation.fr: et vous faufiler dans mon Palais ?

translation.en: We don't need permission from you.
translation.fr:
On n'a pas besoin
de votre permission.

translation.en: Fiery.
I don't believe we've met. I'm Mr. Electric.
translation.fr:
Nous n'avons pas été présentés.
Je suis M. Electric.

translation.en: Why are you bringing misery to our planet?
-You're supposed to be running it. -"You're supposed to be running it."
I am running it. Right into the ground.
translation.fr: Je la dirige. Droit dans le mur !

translation.en: -Those are my orders. -Who ordered that?
translation.fr:
- Ce sont mes ordres.
- Les ordres de qui ?

translation.en: No school, no discipline, no rules.
translation.fr:
Pas d'école, pas de discipline,
pas de lois !

translation.en: And most important, no dreams.
Dreams can destroy you, can't they? My instincts tell me that is so.
translation.fr:
Les rêves vous détruiraient, hein ?
Mon instinct me le dit.

translation.en: -Oh, really? -That's why we have to stop you.
translation.fr:
- Oh, vraiment ?
- C'est pour ça qu'on doit vous arrêter.

translation.en: You and what army?
-Now? -Now.
Feel the burn.
Now for reals.
Internal radar, shark-like reflexes. You're amazing.
translation.fr:
Sens radar, réflexes de requin.
T'es mortel !

translation.en: But is it enough to defeat Mr. Electric?
translation.fr: Pas assez pour battre M. Electric.

translation.en: We have our secret weapon. Remember?
translation.fr:
On a une arme secrète,
rappelle-toi.

translation.en: Did you really believe you could stop me?
I know we can't, but he can.
translation.fr:
Nous, non.
Mais lui, il le peut.

translation.en: Take it away, Max.
Show him what you're made of, Max.
What am I supposed to do?
-I told you this would happen. -I thought he would just remember.
translation.fr:
- Je t'avais prévenue.
- Je croyais qu'il se souviendrait.

translation.en: Remember what?
The dream. Remember the dream.
I don't remember half my dreams.
translation.fr: J'oublie la moitié de mes rêves.

translation.en: That's why I write them in my dream journal.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je les écris !

translation.en: What half of your dreams do you remember?
translation.fr: De quelle moitié tu te souviens ?

translation.en: This part I remember.
-Where are you taking us? -Where all the useless dreams go.
translation.fr:
- Où nous emmenez-vous ?
- Là où les rêves inutiles vont.

translation.en: To the Dream Graveyard.
Well, at least we're on the Passage of Time.
translation.fr:
Au moins,
on est au Passage du Temps.

translation.en: -Maybe it'll take us to the Dream Lair. -It's going in the wrong direction.
translation.fr:
- Ça mène au Palais des Rêves ?
- Ça va à l'opposé.

translation.en: The Dream Lair's that way.
translation.fr: Le Palais des Rêves est par là.

translation.en: What's in the Dream Lair?
translation.fr: Il y a quoi, dans le Palais ?

translation.en: It's where all the dreams that fuel Planet Drool are stored.
translation.fr:
Tous les rêves
qui alimentent la planète.

translation.en: But they're being destroyed.
-How? -That's what we have to find out.
Soon even Sharkboy and I will cease to exist.
translation.fr:
Sharkboy et moi
allons bientôt disparaître.

translation.en: Duck.
Max, where is your dream journal?
translation.fr: Où est ton journal de rêves ?

translation.en: Great thinking, Sharkie.
We can read his dreams out loud...
translation.fr: En lisant ses rêves à haute voix,

translation.en: ...and turn everything back to the way it was.
I may even realize my true identity.
translation.fr:
Je découvrirai peut-être
ma véritable identité.

translation.en: I threw it away.
My journal's back on Earth.
We really thought you were the answer, Max.
translation.fr:
On pensait
que tu étais la solution.

translation.en: Don't listen to him.
He's upset because you didn't show up and make him King of the Ocean...
translation.fr:
Il est fâché car tu ne l'as pas rêvé
Roi de l'Océan,

translation.en: ...with a giant fish army to back him up.
translation.fr: à la tête d'une armée de poissons.

translation.en: Look who's talking.
You thought you'd find a great use for your powers and heal the planet.
translation.fr:
Tu pensais que tes pouvoirs
sauveraient la planète.

translation.en: Max thought his dream world would be a happy place.
translation.fr:
Max pensait que son monde rêvé
était joyeux.

translation.en: We've all been duped.
I think you broke my fin.
Sorry.
Hey, you. I see you hiding.
Come back here.
I was awakened.
I'm sorry.
Did all the children from Mount Neverest escape?
translation.fr:
Tous les enfants du Mont Sans-Repos
se sont enfuis ?

translation.en: With Sharkboy and Lavagirl. But I took care of it. See?
translation.fr:
Avec Sharkboy et Lavagirl.
Mais c'est réglé.

translation.en: Someone was with them?
Just another child afraid of his own shadow. No threat to us.
translation.fr:
Un morveux terrorisé par son ombre.
Rien à craindre.

translation.en: I banished him to the Dream Graveyard.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai expédié
au Cimetière des Rêves.

translation.en: Where old dreams lie? He could find an ally.
translation.fr:
Avec les vieux rêves ?
Il pourrait trouver un allié.

translation.en: I told you, every dream must be smashed...
translation.fr:
Tous les rêves
doivent être écrabouillés,

translation.en: ...every child captured.
If you want him back, I'll simply track him when he falls asleep.
translation.fr:
Si vous le voulez,
je l'aurai quand il s'endormira.

translation.en: Fool. He's the Daydreamer...
...and the moment he realizes it will be the moment of our doom.
translation.fr:
Quand il s'en rendra compte,
ce sera notre fin.

translation.en: Now what do you want me to do?
Bring me the boy before he discovers his true powers...
translation.fr:
Trouve-le
avant qu'il ne découvre ses pouvoirs

translation.en: ...and tears my new kingdom apart.
Plugs, redirect the Darkness.
And...
...bring me the Plug Hounds.
We'll never find our way out of this graveyard.
translation.fr: On ne sortira jamais de ce cimetière.

translation.en: Darkness headed this way.
Sit down, Max.
-What for? -Close your eyes and dream.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi ?
- Ferme les yeux et rêve.

translation.en: If Max can't remember his dreams, maybe he can re-dream them.
translation.fr:
S'il ne se rappelle pas ses rêves,
il n'a qu'à les re-rêver.

translation.en: -He could dream us out of here. -Dream, Max.
translation.fr:
- Il pourrait nous rêver loin d'ici.
- Rêve, Max !

translation.en: Now, what do you see?
I see a giant...
...chocolate-chunk marshmallow cookie...
...with lots of warm milk.
translation.fr: et des tonnes de lait chaud.

translation.en: -Sorry, I'm starving. -Here's some food.
translation.fr:
- Désolé, je meurs de faim.
- Voilà de la nourriture.

translation.en: -You're not gonna like that. -I'm so hungry, I could eat lava rocks.
translation.fr:
- Tu ne vas pas aimer.
- J'avalerais des pierres de lave.

translation.en: -What is that? -Lava rocks.
translation.fr:
- C'est quoi ?
- Des pierres de lave.

translation.en: Here, have some real food. Fresh sushi.
translation.fr:
Tiens, de la vraie nourriture.
Un sushi frais.

translation.en: -It'll knock you right out. -That's not fresh.
translation.fr:
- Tu vas adorer.
- C'est pas frais !

translation.en: -I'm not sure that's sushi anymore. -Just a few weeks old.
translation.fr:
- Il fait plus très "sushi".
- Il a juste quelques semaines.

translation.en: I'll cook it for you.
That's okay. I'm not that hungry anymore.
translation.fr: Ça ira. Je n'ai plus faim.

translation.en: Let me just rest a moment. Maybe I can sleep.
translation.fr:
Je vais me reposer.
J'arriverai peut-être à dormir.

translation.en: It's getting closer.
Get out of here.
Max, I know you got a lot to figure out...
translation.fr:
Je sais que tu as
du pain sur la planche,

translation.en: ...but if you happen to dream about who I am and how I fit into this world...
translation.fr:
mais si tu rêvais de mon identité
et de mon rôle dans ce monde,

translation.en: -...it would be helpful for me to know. -No distractions.
translation.fr:
- ça m'aiderait.
- Ne le distrais pas !

translation.en: You steer him off-course, we could be lost in a sea of dreams.
translation.fr:
Sinon, on va se perdre
dans une mer de rêves.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm desperate. -Focus on the problem at hand.
translation.fr:
- Désolée, je suis désespérée.
- On a une urgence.

translation.en: Max needs to dream us out of here, so how about I put him to sleep now?
translation.fr:
Max doit rêver.
Je lui file un coup de main ?

translation.en: -No, Sharkboy. -One punch, he'll be out like a light.
translation.fr: Un crochet, et il s'allonge direct.

translation.en: I've seen this before. It's on the tip of my finger.
translation.fr:
J'ai déjà vu ça !
Je l'ai sur...

translation.en: It's a hand.
It is a hand.
A hand?
Another hand.
-Yep, it's Tobor! -Who?
Tobor. I dreamt him up when I was a kid.
translation.fr:
Tobor ! Je l'ai imaginé
quand j'étais petit.

translation.en: A robot that could help me with my homework.
translation.fr:
Un robot qui m'aiderait
à faire mes devoirs.

translation.en: I tried to build him once.
Everyone kept telling me he would never work.
translation.fr:
On me disait
qu'il ne fonctionnerait jamais.

translation.en: So here he is.
A forgotten dream in the Dream Graveyard.
translation.fr:
Un rêve oublié,
au Cimetière des Rêves.

translation.en: -Maybe he can help us. -He's supposed to be very smart.
translation.fr:
- Il pourrait nous aider.
- Il est censé être super intelligent.

translation.en: -Tobor, awake. -Yes?
He works.
We could ask him anything now.
Let me. Let me. Tell me something about me.
-I'm clueless. -Actually, you are extremely bright.
translation.fr:
- Je suis perdue.
- En fait, tu es extrêmement brillante.

translation.en: -Am I King of the Ocean, or what? -No, sorry.
translation.fr:
- Suis-je le Roi de l'Océan ?
- Non, désolé.

translation.en: How do I save Planet Drool?
translation.fr:
Comment je peux sauver
la planète Roucool ?

translation.en: The answer is in your dreams.
translation.fr: La réponse est dans tes rêves.

translation.en: You mean if I put him to sleep, he'll dream us out of this mess?
translation.fr:
Si je l'endors, il rêvera
qu'on est sortis de ce pétrin ?

translation.en: No. At least not here.
Darkness is falling.
Any dream of his will become a nightmare...
translation.fr:
Chacun de ses rêves
deviendra un cauchemar,

translation.en: ...and you don't want those becoming a reality.
translation.fr:
et il ne vaut mieux pas
qu'ils deviennent réalité.

translation.en: But if you go to the Land of Milk and Cookies...
translation.fr:
Mais si vous allez
au Pays de Lait et de Cookies...

translation.en: -Of course. -...that's where the good dreams are.
translation.fr:
- Bien sûr !
- C'est le refuge des bons rêves.

translation.en: -Where the answers are. -It's perfect, Max.
translation.fr:
- Là où sont les réponses.
- C'est parfait.

translation.en: The Land of Milk and Cookies is a safe, sweet place.
translation.fr:
Le Pays de Lait et de Cookies
est sûr et délicieux.

translation.en: You'll be able to dream easily there.
-Can you take us? -I have no body. I can't move.
translation.fr:
- Tu nous emmènes ?
- Sans corps, je ne peux pas bouger.

translation.en: You can move your eyes and your mouth.
translation.fr: Tu peux bouger les yeux et la bouche.

translation.en: Why didn't you work back on Earth, Tobor?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tu ne fonctionnais pas,
sur Terre ?

translation.en: Some dreams are so powerful they become real...
translation.fr:
Certains rêves sont si puissants
qu'ils deviennent réels,

translation.en: ...like Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
I, on the other hand, am still only a dream.
translation.fr:
Moi, par contre,
je suis resté un rêve.

translation.en: -What's wrong? -Train of thought, I'm losing it.
translation.fr:
- Qu'y a-t-il ?
- La Ligne de Pensée m'échappe.

translation.en: You were taking us to the Land of Milk and Cookies, remember?
translation.fr:
Tu allais au Pays
de Lait et de Cookies.

translation.en: I mean, I'm literally losing the Train of Thought.
translation.fr:
Non, la vraie Ligne de Pensée
s'échappe.

translation.en: -It's down there. -That's the Train of Thought?
translation.fr:
- En bas.
- C'est ça, la Ligne de Pensée ?

translation.en: -How do I keep it on track? -With your mind.
translation.fr:
- Comment ne pas dérailler ?
- Utilise ton esprit.

translation.en: The Train of Thought gets easily distracted.
translation.fr:
La Ligne de Pensée
s'égare facilement.

translation.en: Stay focused, and it'll speed you directly...
...to the Land of Milk and Cookies. The rest is up to you.
translation.fr:
au Pays de Lait et de Cookies.
Le reste dépend de toi.

translation.en: Sorry I forgot about you, Tobor.
Are you kidding? You just saved me. I'm free!
translation.fr:
Tu plaisantes ? Tu viens
de me sauver. Je suis libre !

translation.en: Max, get down here!
-What's wrong? -We can't control it.
translation.fr:
- Y a un problème ?
- On ne peut pas la contrôler !

translation.en: All you have to do is keep it on track.
translation.fr: Il suffit de suivre les rails.

translation.en: How can we keep it on track if there is no track?
Looks like another dream gone bad.
-What do we do? -Yell. Scream.
Jump! It'll be all right.
What does it mean when your Train of Thought wrecks?
translation.fr:
C'est grave
si la Ligne de Pensée s'écrase ?

translation.en: Well...
...can't be good, buddy.
How much time do we have, Sharkboy?
translation.fr: Combien de temps on a, Sharkboy ?

translation.en: Twenty minutes.
Stick to rotten fish, please.
Chocolate. I stepped in chocolate.
translation.fr:
Du chocolat !
J'ai marché dans le chocolat !

translation.en: We're here.
The Land of Milk and Cookies.
translation.fr: Le Pays de Lait et de Cookies.

translation.en: The milk is warm.
-He'll be out in no time. -Lay down.
Here's a marshmallow pillow.
How about dreaming us into the Dream Lair?
translation.fr: Rêve qu'on est au Palais des Rêves.

translation.en: The ground is thumping too much.
My highly trained ears hear it too.
-Let me hear it. -I wouldn't.
translation.fr:
- Je veux écouter.
- Je te le déconseille.

translation.en: Hothead.
When you dreamt up these giant cookies...
translation.fr: Quand tu as rêvé ces cookies géants,

translation.en: ...who did you expect to be able to eat them?
translation.fr: qui était capable de les manger ?

translation.en: I really didn't think about it.
Because if you dream giant cookies...
translation.fr: Si tu rêves de cookies géants,

translation.en: ...something has to be created to consume giant cookies.
translation.fr:
il doit exister quelque chose
pour les avaler.

translation.en: Cookie giants!
Frosting.
Those giants almost looked like my parents.
translation.fr:
Ces géants ressemblent
à mes parents.

translation.en: They seem happy together. Is that your dream?
translation.fr:
Ils ont l'air heureux.
C'est ton rêve ?

translation.en: We had a dream of family. It hasn't been coming true lately.
translation.fr:
On rêvait d'une famille unie.
C'est loin d'être réel, aujourd'hui.

translation.en: Most dreams don't come true on their own.
translation.fr:
Les rêves ne se réalisent pas
tout seuls.

translation.en: You have to make them true.
Takes a lot of work. Not easy.
translation.fr:
Ça demande beaucoup d'efforts.
Pas facile.

translation.en: But not impossible either.
Stinking fresh air. Blinding sunlight.
translation.fr:
Puanteur d'air pur !
Saleté de soleil !

translation.en: Oh, how I long for a sky with fluorescent lights.
translation.fr:
Je rêve d'un ciel
fait de tubes fluorescents !

translation.en: Stand back.
All right, that one was me.
Still empty-handed, I see.
translation.fr: Toujours bredouille, à ce que je vois.

translation.en: -You're so powerful, you find him. -That's your job.
translation.fr:
- Si vous êtes si fort, trouvez-le.
- C'est ton boulot !

translation.en: Do it, or I'll have you discharged.
Someone is dreaming in here.
All right, Max. You've had your cookies and milk, now go to sleep.
translation.fr:
Tu as eu tes cookies et ton lait.
Maintenant, dors.

translation.en: I'll try.
-Go to sleep. -Not like that. Sing him a lullaby.
translation.fr:
- Dors.
- Pas comme ça. Une berceuse.

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream, dream
Your turn.
Close your eyes, shut your mouth Dream a dream and get us out
translation.fr:
Tes yeux et ta bouche fermés
Rêve qu'on sorte de ce guêpier

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream, Dream, dream, dream
Hit the hay, fast asleep Dream a dream, you little bleep
translation.fr:
Pique un somme, ronfle fort
Fais un rêve, ou t'es mort

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream, Dream, dream, dream
It's working! Keep it up, Sharkboy!
Just relax, lay about Or my fist will put you out
translation.fr:
Détends-toi, couche-toi là
Ou mon poing t'y aidera

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream, Dream, dream, dream
Take your time, but beware There is Darkness in the air
translation.fr:
Prends ton temps, mais garde en tête
Que les Ténèbres nous guettent

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream Dream, dream, dream
Dream about me next, Max. I need to know who I am.
Not just destruction or a simple flame.
translation.fr:
Pas juste une destructrice,
ou une flamme.

translation.en: Dream of me as something good.
translation.fr: Rêve que je suis quelqu'un de bien.

translation.en: Don't despair, step right up Glass of water, here's a cup
translation.fr:
Va de l'avant, persévère
Bois de l'eau, tiens, un verre

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream Dream, dream, dream
He's having a nightmare. Wake up, Max! Wake up!
translation.fr:
Il fait un cauchemar !
Réveille-toi, Max !

translation.en: Stop that racket, Sharkboy. You're giving him nightmares!
translation.fr:
Arrête ce boucan !
Tu lui donnes des cauchemars !

translation.en: Sorry, Max.
-What was that for? -Your nightmare was about me...
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi tu as fait ça ?
- Tu faisais un cauchemar sur moi,

translation.en: ...wasn't it?
I don't remember.
But I did dream about one thing.
translation.fr: Mais j'ai bien fait un rêve.

translation.en: Plug Hounds!
This may come as a shock to you.
translation.fr: Ça risque de vous faire un choc.

translation.en: Feel the power!
It's empty.
Fudge.
-I forgot to dream of gas. -Max!
translation.fr: J'ai oublié de rêver du plein.

translation.en: My powers are weakening.
Watch the power lines, very dangerous.
translation.fr:
Gare aux câbles à haute tension !
Très dangereux.

translation.en: -Sharkboy, get me down from here! -Can't you see I'm busy?
translation.fr:
- Sharkboy, fais-moi descendre !
- Tu vois pas que je suis occupé ?

translation.en: Hot lava. Hot lava.
-I don't got much fight left in me, Max. -Where's Lavagirl?
translation.fr:
- Je n'ai plus la force de me battre.
- Où est Lavagirl ?

translation.en: It's up to you now, Max. Dream us out of here.
translation.fr:
Tout dépend de toi, Max !
Rêve-nous loin d'ici !

translation.en: We believe in you, Max.
Shark Boat with turbo boosters. Shark Boat with turbo boosters!
A banana split?
Still hungry, Max? How about a knuckle sandwich?
translation.fr:
Encore faim ?
Je te file un sandwich au pain ?

translation.en: No, look.
It's a banana split boat.
translation.fr: C'est un bateau en banana split !

translation.en: Then let's split!
Catch you later.
All dreamers must dream.
translation.fr: Tous les rêveurs finissent par rêver.

translation.en: This is great, Max. You're starting to daydream.
translation.fr:
C'est génial,
tu commences à rêver éveillé.

translation.en: Keep that up and they'll never get us.
translation.fr: Continue et ils ne nous auront jamais.

translation.en: Why not?
Learn to dream with your eyes open...
translation.fr: Apprends à rêver les yeux ouverts,

translation.en: ...then you won't have to be asleep to dream.
translation.fr: et tu n'auras plus besoin de dormir.

translation.en: You'll be able to make anything happen at any time.
translation.fr:
Tu concrétiseras ce que tu veux,
quand tu veux.

translation.en: Row, row, row Your banana split boat
translation.fr:
Va tout doux
Petit bateau en banana split

translation.en: Gently down The Stream of Consciousness
translation.fr:
Descends tout doux
Le Flot des Consciences

translation.en: Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily Life is Max's dream
translation.fr:
Flotte tout doux, tu sais
La vie est un rêve de Max

translation.en: Sugar will give you nightmares.
translation.fr: Le sucre te file des cauchemars.

translation.en: -How much time do we have? -Don't ask.
translation.fr:
- Combien de temps on a ?
- Laisse tomber.

translation.en: The Dream Lair's across the Ocean of Ice.
translation.fr:
Le Palais des Rêves
est après l'Océan gelé.

translation.en: We'll have to travel there by foot.
translation.fr: On va devoir y aller à pied.

translation.en: What was it you saw in your dream, Max?
translation.fr: Qu'as-tu vu dans ton rêve, Max ?

translation.en: I saw an object shaped like....
translation.fr: J'ai vu un objet, en forme de...

translation.en: Give me something to draw with.
The Crystal Heart.
That's the treasure of the Land of Ice, in the Ice Castle.
translation.fr:
C'est le trésor du Pays de Glace,
dans le Château de Glace.

translation.en: It can freeze anything, even time.
translation.fr:
Il peut tout geler,
même le temps.

translation.en: I've always dreamt of freezing a moment in time.
translation.fr:
J'ai toujours rêvé
de geler les bons moments.

translation.en: And the Ice Castle's ruled by the Ice Princess.
translation.fr: C'est le fief de la Princesse de Glace.

translation.en: I hear she's the most beautiful girl on the planet.
translation.fr:
Ce serait la plus belle fille
de la planète.

translation.en: She is not! She's cold and cruel and cares for nobody but herself.
translation.fr:
C'est faux !
Elle est froide, cruelle et égoïste.

translation.en: She's just saying that, Max.
-You met her? -No, but I know we don't get along.
translation.fr:
- Tu la connais ?
- Non. Mais on ne s'entendra pas.

translation.en: -How do you know that? -I'm fire, she's ice.
translation.fr:
- Comment tu le sais ?
- Je suis le feu. Elle, la glace.

translation.en: -We must be enemies. -We need that Crystal Heart.
translation.fr:
- On est forcément ennemies.
- Il nous faut ce cristal.

translation.en: But I need you both to get it.
I just hope this isn't a trap.
translation.fr: J'espère que ce n'est pas un piège.

translation.en: If we freeze time with the Crystal Heart...
translation.fr: Si on gèle le temps avec le cristal,

translation.en: ...we'll be able to make it to the Dream Lair and save the planet.
translation.fr:
on sera au Palais des Rêves
à temps pour sauver la planète.

translation.en: That's the plan.
Behold the Ice Castle. Home to the princess of the Land of Ice.
translation.fr:
Admirez le Château de Glace,
où vit la princesse du Pays de Glace.

translation.en: -The Crystal Heart's inside the castle? -So they say.
translation.fr:
- Le Cœur de Cristal est dedans ?
- Il paraît.

translation.en: Let's go.
It's no use. I'll melt the bridge.
translation.fr:
Pas la peine !
Je vais faire fondre le pont !

translation.en: This place inflames me.
Can you cool down enough to get across?
I'd have to be asleep to do that.
translation.fr: Je dois dormir, pour y arriver.

translation.en: Can you try sleepwalking?
My dream is to live on Earth, but someplace warm.
translation.fr:
Je rêve que je vis sur Terre,
mais dans un pays chaud.

translation.en: And that Earth will accept me. Even if I...
translation.fr:
Et que la Terre m'accepte.
Même si je...

translation.en: ...destroy everything I touch.
translation.fr: détruis tout ce que je... touche !

translation.en: No, Lavagirl! Don't sneeze!
Look.
She's sleeping.
They found us again. Lavagirl!
If you wake her up, she'll reheat.
translation.fr: Si tu la réveilles, elle va re-chauffer.

translation.en: She can make it.
Lavagirl, they're behind you!
Let's go. Hurry!
It's a trap!
You can almost feel the electricity in the air, can't you?
translation.fr:
Il y a de l'électricité dans l'air,
vous sentez ?

translation.en: This is all wrong. Someone else's dreams are in here.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas normal.
Ce sont les rêves d'un autre.

translation.en: Lights out.
Welcome to the Dream Lair.
I am the ruler of Planet Drool.
translation.fr:
Je suis le maître
de la planète Roucool.

translation.en: No, you're not. Max is.
Max may have dreamed it originally...
translation.fr: Max l'a peut-être rêvée, au départ...

translation.en: ...but I made it much cooler.
translation.fr: mais je l'ai rendue bien plus sympa.

translation.en: I am Minus.
-How'd you get so powerful? -I do a lot of reading.
translation.fr:
- Comment es-tu devenu si puissant ?
- Je lis énormément.

translation.en: My book of dreams.
That's why everything is so messed up. He's changing it.
translation.fr:
C'est pour ça que c'est la pagaille.
Il le modifie.

translation.en: Electric eels.
Shocking, isn't it, Sharkboy?
Reminds me of the time that electrical storm...
translation.fr:
Ça me rappelle cette tempête
chargée d'électricité

translation.en: ...blew apart your father's laboratory.
translation.fr:
qui balaya
le laboratoire de ton père.

translation.en: -Where is my father? -Let's see.
translation.fr:
- Où est mon père ?
- Voyons cela...

translation.en: Check the bottom of the ocean.
And Lavagirl.
Once I figure out how to freeze this planet's core...
translation.fr:
Quand j'aurai refroidi
le cœur de la planète,

translation.en: ...all of your powers will disappear.
Powers? What powers?
And last but least, Max.
translation.fr:
Et le dernier,
mais bien des moindres : Max.

translation.en: You thought you could escape fear by running away to Dreamland...
translation.fr:
Tu croyais fuir la peur
au Pays des Rêves.

translation.en: ...but fear exists in the one place you can never escape.
translation.fr:
La peur est dans le seul endroit
que tu ne pourras jamais fuir.

translation.en: Your mind.
I will show you the true meaning of fear.
translation.fr:
Je vais te montrer
ce qu'est la peur.

translation.en: When Darkness falls, the rest of your dreams will be destroyed...
translation.fr:
Les Ténèbres détruiront
tes derniers rêves,

translation.en: ...and I will rule Planet Drool.
translation.fr: et je régnerai sur cette planète.

translation.en: Blah, blah, blah...
...threat, threat, threat.
You must all leave now. I have some dreaming to do.
translation.fr:
Disparaissez, maintenant.
J'ai du rêve à produire.

translation.en: If I could just get my dream journal...
translation.fr: Si je pouvais récupérer mon journal,

translation.en: ...I could turn everything back to the way it was.
My fire's dimming.
-I can't melt the bars. -My strength is failing me as well.
translation.fr:
- Les barreaux ne fondent pas.
- Et ma force me lâche.

translation.en: How much time do we have, Sharkboy?
translation.fr: Combien de temps on a, Sharkboy ?

translation.en: Who cares? We're never getting out of here.
translation.fr:
Peu importe,
on ne sortira jamais d'ici.

translation.en: La La's.
They like you.
-I don't feel destructive right now. -I do!
translation.fr:
- Je ne me sens plus destructrice.
- Moi si !

translation.en: This song is driving me crazy.
Don't worry about him. He's a cold fish.
translation.fr:
N'ayez pas peur.
C'est un poisson rouge.

translation.en: I'm serious.
They're singing at a frequency...
...my highly trained ears find disturbing!
Sing louder. Sing higher.
You don't want to be too close to him when he explodes.
Shark frenzy!
Nice job channeling your anger, Sharkie.
First things first, transportation out of here.
translation.fr:
Priorité des priorités :
un moyen de locomotion.

translation.en: My dreams.
-Lavagirl, you have a Lava Bike. -I do?
translation.fr:
- Tu as une Lavabécane.
- C'est vrai ?

translation.en: I do!
-This is so exciting. -Cool it, Lavagirl.
translation.fr:
- C'est trop génial !
- Garde la tête froide.

translation.en: Everything we need is right here in this book.
translation.fr:
Tout ce qu'on veut
est dans ce journal.

translation.en: Sharkboy...
...your father really is at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.fr:
Ton père est vraiment
au fond de l'océan.

translation.en: He's in a submarine...
...looking for you.
He's over the hydrothermal vents, Mid-Atlantic Ridge...
translation.fr:
Les sources hydrothermales
de la dorsale médio-atlantique,

translation.en: ...42 degrees west by 14 north.
Depth, 1800 meters. Near Snake Pit.
translation.fr:
Profondeur, 1 800 mètres.
Le site de Snake Pit !

translation.en: -I need to get back to Earth. -What's it say about me?
translation.fr:
- Je retourne sur Terre.
- Ça dit quoi, sur moi ?

translation.en: -I'm not sure what this is. -I can figure it out.
translation.fr:
- C'est pas clair.
- Je peux t'éclairer !

translation.en: Maybe there's a section on my true identity.
translation.fr: Ça dit peut-être qui je suis.

translation.en: Lavagirl, no!
Oh, no.
-What have I done? -That's terrific, LG.
translation.fr:
- Qu'est-ce que j'ai fait ?
- Bien joué !

translation.en: It's okay, Lavagirl.
It was an accident.
Why did you make me out of lava? Why, Max?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tu m'as faite en lave ?
Pourquoi ?

translation.en: Just let her cool down. She's just blowing off steam.
translation.fr:
Laisse passer l'éruption.
Elle évacue la pression.

translation.en: I know I can be good.
I can feel it.
But everything I touch, I destroy.
translation.fr:
Mais tout ce que je touche,
je le détruis.

translation.en: Why'd you make me like that?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu m'as faite comme ça ?

translation.en: -I have more potential. -I'm sure you do.
translation.fr:
- J'ai un vrai potentiel.
- J'en suis sûr.

translation.en: Why'd you make us a team? We're nothing alike.
translation.fr:
Pourquoi nous avoir réunis ?
On a rien en commun !

translation.en: When I'm near water, I fizzle out. When he's near heat, he shrivels.
translation.fr:
Exposée à l'eau, je m'éteins.
A la chaleur, il se dessèche.

translation.en: We're not compatible.
Your hair's on fire.
Yeah, it does that.
Thanks, Sharkie.
Maybe I really am evil.
So far everything else you've dreamed has been correct.
translation.fr:
Jusqu'ici, tes autres rêves
se sont révélés corrects.

translation.en: Maybe I just need to learn to accept it.
That's it. Everything I've dreamt so far has been correct.
translation.fr:
C'est vrai ! Tous mes rêves
se sont révélés corrects.

translation.en: The Crystal Heart.
Yeah, we were captured...
...but that's because Minus doesn't want me to get it.
translation.fr: car Malus refuse que je le trouve.

translation.en: We have to get back to the Ice Castle.
translation.fr:
On doit retourner
au Château de Glace !

translation.en: Ten minutes left. We'll never make it.
translation.fr:
Plus que 10 mn.
On n'y arrivera jamais !

translation.en: We can do it!
-How? -How?
You're Sharkboy and Lavagirl. You can do anything.
translation.fr:
Sharkboy et Lavagirl
sont capables de tout.

translation.en: Wake up.
-What? -He escaped.
He's getting the Crystal Heart.
translation.fr: Il cherche le Cœur de Cristal.

translation.en: -Shut it down. Shut it all down now. -I did!
It's on a grid system. It takes time for the Darkness to travel.
translation.fr:
C'est un réseau. Les Ténèbres
mettent du temps pour se répandre.

translation.en: -How soon? -Not soon enough.
translation.fr:
- Ils y seront quand ?
- Trop tard.

translation.en: -Then destroy him. -How?
By smashing his most precious dream:
translation.fr:
En anéantissant
son rêve le plus cher :

translation.en: Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
-Is that what you saw, Max? -Yes.
translation.fr: C'est ce que tu avais vu ?

translation.en: You'll have to climb the ice pillar and get it.
translation.fr:
Tu devras escalader
pour le récupérer.

translation.en: It's as delicate as a snowflake, so don't drop it.
translation.fr:
Il est fragile comme un flocon
de neige. Ne le lâche pas.

translation.en: Don't touch it with your hands either. You'll freeze! Use your claws.
translation.fr:
Ne le touche pas avec tes mains.
Tu gèlerais. Utilise tes griffes.

translation.en: Lava, can you--?
Never mind.
Chew on some ice. It'll keep you cool.
translation.fr:
Croque un glaçon.
Tu resteras de glace.

translation.en: Great job, Max!
I got it!
She's frozen solid!
Kneel before the Ice Princess.
translation.fr:
A genoux,
devant la Princesse de Glace.

translation.en: You tried to steal the Crystal Heart. Why?
translation.fr:
Vous vouliez voler le Cœur de Cristal.
Pourquoi ?

translation.en: We believe it can freeze time.
Long enough for us to defeat Minus.
My Crystal Heart cannot help you. Only I have the power to use it.
translation.fr:
Mon cristal ne peut vous aider.
Moi seule peux l'utiliser.

translation.en: -Then come with us. -She can never leave this castle.
translation.fr:
- Venez avec nous.
- Elle ne sort pas d'ici.

translation.en: The Crystal is the only thing that protects our kingdom.
translation.fr:
Le cristal est la seule chose
qui protège notre royaume.

translation.en: Please, princess, we're running out of time.
translation.fr:
Vite, Princesse,
on n'a plus le temps.

translation.en: -Perhaps I could give it to you. -Not without my blessing.
translation.fr:
- Je pourrais te le confier.
- Pas sans ma bénédiction.

translation.en: Father, you're smothering me again.
-But are you worthy to wield it? -Yes.
The crystal you stole was a decoy.
translation.fr:
Le cristal que vous avez volé
est faux.

translation.en: The true Crystal Heart is somewhere in this room.
translation.fr:
Le vrai est quelque part
dans cette pièce.

translation.en: Choose the correct one and you may carry it before you.
translation.fr:
Choisis le bon
et tu pourras l'emporter.

translation.en: Pick that one.
It's around your neck.
-How did you know? -I saw it in my dream.
translation.fr:
- Comment as-tu deviné ?
- Je l'ai vu, en rêve.

translation.en: Usually if you snooze, you lose.
translation.fr:
Faire une sieste,
c'est prendre une veste.

translation.en: With Max, you snooze, you win.
translation.fr:
Avec Max,
une sieste, et c'est gagné.

translation.en: But be warned, Max, if anything happens to my Crystal Heart...
translation.fr:
Mais attention, s'il arrive malheur
à mon Cœur de Cristal,

translation.en: ...my entire kingdom will be destroyed.
translation.fr:
mon royaume tout entier
sera détruit.

translation.en: Do you, Max, take this Crystal Heart...
translation.fr:
Max, acceptez-vous
de prendre ce cristal,

translation.en: ...to have and to hold, in sickness and in health...
translation.fr:
de le chérir,
dans la maladie ou la santé

translation.en: -...till death do you part? -I do.
translation.fr:
jusqu'à ce que la mort
vous sépare ? Oui.

translation.en: -Do you trust him with your heart? -I do.
Do you mean what you say?
Yes. I mean, I do.
The Crystal will now work, but my daughter must stay here.
translation.fr:
Le cristal fonctionnera,
mais ma fille reste ici.

translation.en: -Off with you then. -Good luck.
We're almost to the Dream Lair.
translation.fr:
On est presque
au Palais des Rêves !

translation.en: If we're gonna do this, we gotta do it now.
translation.fr:
Si on doit agir,
c'est maintenant !

translation.en: -How much time? -We're out of time.
Ten seconds.
What? I can't hear you.
-Five seconds. -Here it goes.
Three, two, one.
-We're out of time. -What happened?
translation.fr:
- Le temps est écoulé.
- Que s'est-il passé ?

translation.en: -It didn't work. -How could it not work?
I was trying to tell you.
translation.fr: J'ai essayé de vous le dire.

translation.en: Only the Ice Princess can use it.
It's not her fault her father won't let her leave her castle.
translation.fr:
C'est pas sa faute,
son père la retient au château.

translation.en: No underwater readings.
No anything.
I'll rip his circuits to shreds!
Calm down, Sharkboy. Mr. Electric's baiting you.
translation.fr:
Tout doux, Sharkboy.
M. Electric t'appâte.

translation.en: -I can't fight my instincts! -No, Sharkboy!
translation.fr:
Je ne peux pas combattre...
mes instincts !

translation.en: "Watts" up?
You know, "watts."
As in a measure of electrical power.
The 60-watt bulb?
Watts up?
Watt?
Electric eels.
That's what's up.
Swim away, Sharkboy! Swim away!
Can he survive down there?
He can hold his breath, but not forever.
translation.fr:
Il retient son souffle,
mais pas éternellement.

translation.en: -He'll drown if I don't go get him. -I can't let you go.
translation.fr:
- Il va se noyer si je n'y vais pas.
- Pas question !

translation.en: You'll die too.
He's my best friend.
Come on, Sharkboy.
Come on, Sharkboy.
Sharkboy. Wake up, Sharkboy.
Lavagirl! Lavagirl, please.
What am I gonna do now?
What do you think you should do?
translation.fr: A ton avis, que dois-tu faire ?

translation.en: Dream a better dream?
Interesting. Explain.
I wanted all my dreams to come true...
translation.fr: Je voulais que mes rêves se réalisent,

translation.en: ...but I only dreamt for myself.
translation.fr: mais je n'ai rêvé que pour moi.

translation.en: I wanted to escape my real world...
translation.fr: Je voulais fuir le monde réel,

translation.en: ...when the world needed my help to make it a better place.
translation.fr:
alors qu'il avait besoin
que je le rende meilleur.

translation.en: Selfish dreams shouldn't come true.
translation.fr:
Les rêves égoïstes
ne doivent pas se réaliser.

translation.en: You're becoming a very good dreamer, Max.
translation.fr: Tu deviens un très bon rêveur.

translation.en: A very good dreamer indeed.
translation.fr: Un très bon rêveur, ma foi.

translation.en: What do you do...
...when your dreams have been destroyed?
translation.fr: quand les rêves ont été détruits ?

translation.en: Dream a better dream.
An unselfish dream.
She knew this would happen if she saved you.
I couldn't stop her.
Look.
Lava.
-We have to get her to that volcano. -I'll go.
translation.fr:
- Il faut l'emmener jusqu'à ce volcan.
- J'y vais.

translation.en: -I'm stronger and faster. -You'll burn up.
translation.fr:
- Je suis plus fort et plus rapide.
- Tu vas griller.

translation.en: -Are you sure this will save her? -It'll do more than save her.
translation.fr:
- Tu es sûr que ça la sauvera ?
- Ça fera plus que ça.

translation.en: I know who you are, Lavagirl.
translation.fr: Je sais qui tu es, Lavagirl.

translation.en: You are not fire, or a simple flame.
translation.fr:
Tu n'es pas du feu,
ni une simple flamme.

translation.en: You are greater than that.
translation.fr: Tu es bien mieux que ça.

translation.en: Something more important.
And so necessary.
It is why you must live.
You are not destruction.
You are not evil.
Stand back.
You are...
...light.
Who turned on the lights?
Power! Everywhere!
How did you get here so fast?
Hold off Mr. Electric while I deal with Minus.
I'll need my fish army.
translation.fr:
J'ai besoin
de mon armée de poissons.

translation.en: I'll unfreeze the ocean.
Good luck.
I've become what you feared most, Minus.
translation.fr:
Je suis devenu
ton pire cauchemar, Malus.

translation.en: -How did you get in here? -I'm the Daydreamer.
translation.fr:
- Comment tu es arrivé ici ?
- Je suis le Rêveur éveillé.

translation.en: Able to dream with my eyes open.
translation.fr:
Celui qui peut rêver
les yeux ouverts.

translation.en: Hate to burst your bubble, dream boy, but I read your book.
translation.fr:
Désolé d'exploser ton nuage,
Rêve-boy. J'ai lu ton journal.

translation.en: There's not one dream you've got that I haven't already seen.
translation.fr:
Tu n'as pas un seul rêve
que je n'aie déjà vu.

translation.en: So, what do you say?
Let's blow the roof off this place.
translation.fr: ça te dit de casser la baraque ?

translation.en: May the best dream win.
Wait.
Brainstorm.
Brain...
...freeze!
Brain...
...fart.
Get ready for the ultimate power outage.
translation.fr: Prêt pour la méga panne de secteur ?

translation.en: And who are you to believe that you can defeat me now?
translation.fr:
Qui es-tu pour croire
que tu peux me vaincre ?

translation.en: No one special.
Just...
...King of the Ocean.
Shark frenzy.
You're afraid of me, aren't you?
translation.fr: Tu as peur de moi, pas vrai ?

translation.en: I used to be.
Someone smashed your dreams once.
Now all you can do is smash everyone else's.
translation.fr:
A présent, tu en es réduit
à piétiner ceux des autres.

translation.en: We can create a better dream than this.
translation.fr: On peut créer un rêve meilleur.

translation.en: A better world. Don't you see?
translation.fr:
Un monde meilleur.
Tu ne vois pas ?

translation.en: What do you say...
...Linus?
Hurry.
Don't let me fall!
Wouldn't dream of it.
Don't smash people's dreams, Linus...
...because you'll smash your own as well.
And you too will stop believing.
Max.
I am light.
-Thank you. -You were always that.
Had nothing to do with me.
But now I know.
So thank you.
Okay, so she's a light.
Big deal.
The real news is...
...what I am.
Annoying?
King of the Ocean.
Thanks for saving me.
Everything will return to being the way it was.
You will be able to travel to Earth and back again as you wish.
translation.fr:
Vous pourrez aller et venir
entre les deux mondes.

translation.en: You can search for your father. You can rule Earth's lava world.
translation.fr:
Tu chercheras ton père.
Tu régneras sur Lavaland.

translation.en: And what am I to do, now that you're all buddy-buddy?
translation.fr:
Et je deviens quoi ? Maintenant que
vous êtes copains-copines.

translation.en: Mr. Electric can go back to being the good electrician of the planet.
translation.fr:
M. Electric peut redevenir
notre brave électricien.

translation.en: Oh, really? Plugging in power cords?
translation.fr:
Vraiment ?
Me faire brancher en continu ?

translation.en: Keeping this loud, obnoxious world a happy place?
translation.fr:
Maintenir ce monde puant
dans la joie ?

translation.en: -You're dreaming. -I dreamt you up...
-...and I can undream you. -You think you can just...
translation.fr:
- je peux te dé-rêver.
- Tu crois pouvoir m'effacer

translation.en: ...snap your eyes open and make me vanish? Not so easy.
translation.fr: en un clin d'œil ? Pas si simple.

translation.en: I am the danger of dreaming.
For every person who dreams up the electric light bulb...
...there's the one who dreams up the atom bomb.
translation.fr: un autre imagine la bombe atomique.

translation.en: This is one dream you won't be waking up from.
translation.fr: C'est un rêve dont tu ne sortiras pas.

translation.en: I'm gonna put an end to this ridiculous tangent at its source.
translation.fr:
Je vais fermer
cette ridicule parenthèse à la source.

translation.en: Where did he go?
He's headed to Earth.
He's going to try and destroy you in your sleep.
translation.fr:
Il veut te détruire
dans ton sommeil.

translation.en: In my sleep?
You mean I'm asleep?
translation.fr: Tu veux dire que je dors ?

translation.en: -All this time I've been asleep? -No.
translation.fr: Je dors depuis tout ce temps ?

translation.en: You're dreaming, Max.
-With your eyes open. -Make the dream real.
translation.fr:
- Les yeux ouverts.
- Fais vivre ton rêve.

translation.en: You can live out your dreams on Earth.
translation.fr: Donne vie à tes rêves sur Terre.

translation.en: Just like you made us real.
translation.fr: Comme tu nous as fait vivre.

translation.en: -Make it real. -Blink your eyes three times.
One.
Wait. What happens when--?
Two.
Will I ever see you again?
Three.
Everyone follow me!
We gotta find shelter!
Max, get up!
There's a tornado heading our way!
It's not a tornado!
It's much worse than that!
Linus, wake up!
Look!
Charge!
It's Mr. Electric from Planet Drool!
translation.fr:
C'est M. Electric,
de la planète Roucool.

translation.en: The one from my dreams!
You mean this is real?
translation.fr: Tu veux dire que c'est réel ?

translation.en: Your dream is real?
Some dreams are so powerful they become real.
translation.fr:
Certains rêves sont si puissants
qu'ils le deviennent.

translation.en: I don't believe it.
-It's right there in front of you! -I can see that.
translation.fr:
- C'est juste sous vos yeux.
- Je vois !

translation.en: What I can't believe is...
...you dreamt me as a big round bad guy.
I'm not bad.
Sorry. It kind of took on a life of its own.
translation.fr:
Désolé !
Il a pris vie tout seul.

translation.en: -Max is in building C. -No, he's not, he's in building W.
translation.fr:
- Max est dans le bâtiment C !
- Non, dans le W !

translation.en: That was the other school.
Find Max. Tell him I love him.
translation.fr:
Trouve Max !
Dis-lui que je l'aime.

translation.en: -Don't leave me. -I thought you wanted me to leave.
translation.fr:
- Ne me quitte pas !
- C'est ce que tu voulais !

translation.en: No, I don't. You're my best friend.
translation.fr: Non. Tu es ma meilleure amie.

translation.en: I love you.
I love you too.
Come back!
Please, come back.
I'm not going anywhere.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas l'intention de partir.

translation.en: Neither am I.
Okay, class, I'm just a teacher...
...and I'm here to inspire the answers from you.
translation.fr: est de vous inspirer les réponses.

translation.en: And I think that's some pretty good inspiration outside.
So this is now a pop quiz.
We need to defeat that guy.
Any ideas?
Wow, Linus, you get a plus for being the first hand in the air.
translation.fr:
Un bonus pour Linus.
Tu as levé la main le premier !

translation.en: I can take him.
Linus, watch out!
Nice try.
Sorry, Max.
-Your journal. -It's okay.
It was an accident. Plenty more dreams where those came from.
translation.fr:
c'était un accident.
J'ai plein de rêves en stock.

translation.en: Okay, kids, who's next? Remember, there are no dumb ideas.
translation.fr:
Les enfants, qui d'autre ?
Il n'y a pas d'idée idiote.

translation.en: Maybe we can freeze his circuits.
That's the dumbest idea I've ever heard.
translation.fr:
C'est une idée
des plus idiotes.

translation.en: We're in the middle of Texas in August.
translation.fr: On est au Texas, au mois d'août.

translation.en: -Next idea. Please, anyone but Linus. -Wait, that's a great idea.
translation.fr:
- Idée suivante. A part Linus.
- C'est une idée géniale !

translation.en: Thanks, Linus.
Come here, Marissa.
Is this yours?
How'd you find it?
So you've seen this?
translation.fr: Tu as donc déjà vu ça ?

translation.en: Yes, but only in a dream.
It can freeze anything.
-Even time. -What are you doing?
translation.fr:
- Même le temps.
- Tu fais quoi ?

translation.en: You're not sending my daughter out there.
Let her out.
Electrical storm, headed your way.
-Do you know what to do? -I believe so.
translation.fr:
- Tu sais quoi faire ?
- Je crois.

translation.en: Stand back.
Well, what do we have here?
Get ready for the "megahertz."
-Get it? Hertz? -Mega what?
As in the unit of electrical frequency?
Wow, you just aren't paying attention in class, are you?
translation.fr: Tu n'écoutes pas en cours, ou quoi ?

translation.en: He's unplugged.
It's snowing out!
You made me a great teacher today.
translation.fr:
Tu as fait de moi
un prof du tonnerre.

translation.en: How did I do that?
A great teacher learns as much from his students...
translation.fr:
Un prof doit apprendre
autant des élèves

translation.en: ...as they do from him.
You have...
...awakened me.
Thank you, Max.
...your report, please.
The following story is true.
It might have started as a dream.
translation.fr: Elle a pu commencer par un rêve,

translation.en: But as we saw yesterday...
...when we make our dreams a reality...
...reality becomes a dream.
Sharkboy lives his dream as King of the Ocean...
translation.fr:
Sharkboy vit son rêve :
Roi de l'Océan.

translation.en: ...where he cares for all its creatures.
He searches for his father's submarine where there is no light...
translation.fr:
Il cherche son père
là où il n'y a aucune lumière,

translation.en: ...except in one place...
...where light shines almost as bright as the sun.
translation.fr:
où la lumière brille
presque autant que le soleil.

translation.en: It's where Lavagirl lives her dream...
translation.fr:
C'est là que Lavagirl
vit son rêve :

translation.en: ...as queen of Earth's volcanoes that boil at the bottom of the sea.
translation.fr:
Reine des Volcans
qui réchauffent le fond des mers.

translation.en: A force of life for all living things.
translation.fr:
Une source d'énergie
pour tous les êtres vivants.

translation.en: Sharkboy and Lavagirl don't visit me anymore.
translation.fr:
Sharkboy et Lavagirl
ne me rendent plus visite,

translation.en: But I can visit them, in my dreams.
translation.fr:
mais je peux passer les voir,
en rêve.

translation.en: So dream a better dream...
...then work to make it real.
translation.fr:
et faites en sorte
qu'ils se réalisent.
